name: iknittheweb-website
description: I Knit The Web - Personal Portfolio Website

scripts.build: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.alt node sync-docs.cjs && node optimize-images.cjs && node docs/update-placeholder-guide.cjs && node build.cjs alt && node component-build.cjs alt && npm run build:all-css && node inline-critical-css.mjs && npm run postbuild:fix-html && npm run postbuild:clean-links && npm run postbuild:titlecase-env
scripts.build:local: cross-env BUILD_MODE=local DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env node sync-docs.cjs && node optimize-images.cjs && node docs/update-placeholder-guide.cjs && node build.cjs && node component-build.cjs && npm run build:all-css && node inline-critical-css.mjs && npm run postbuild:fix-html && npm run postbuild:clean-links && npm run postbuild:titlecase-env && npm run test:a11y:all && npm run test:e2e && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:html && npm run test:style
scripts.build:alt: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.alt node sync-docs.cjs && node optimize-images.cjs && node docs/update-placeholder-guide.cjs && node build.cjs alt && node component-build.cjs alt && npm run build:all-css && node inline-critical-css.mjs && npm run postbuild:fix-html && npm run postbuild:clean-links && npm run postbuild:titlecase-env && npm run test:a11y:all && npm run test:e2e && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:html && npm run test:style
scripts.build:alt:skip-tests: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.alt node sync-docs.cjs && node optimize-images.cjs && node docs/update-placeholder-guide.cjs && node build.cjs alt && node component-build.cjs alt && npm run build:all-css && node inline-critical-css.mjs && npm run postbuild:fix-html && npm run postbuild:clean-links && npm run postbuild:titlecase-env
scripts.build:netlify-alt: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.netlify-alt cross-env node build.cjs alt && cross-env node component-build.cjs && npm run build:all-css && node inline-critical-css.mjs && npm run postbuild:fix-html && npm run postbuild:clean-links && npm run postbuild:titlecase-env && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:html && npm run test:style
scripts.build:prod: cross-env DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.production node sync-docs.cjs && node optimize-images.cjs && node docs/update-placeholder-guide.cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build.cjs production && node component-build.cjs && npm run build:all-css && node inline-critical-css.mjs && npm run postbuild:fix-html && npm run postbuild:clean-links && npm run postbuild:titlecase-env && npm run test:a11y:all && npm run test:e2e && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:html && npm run test:style
scripts.build:all-css: sass src/scss/home-styles.scss dist/css/home-styles.css --source-map && sass src/scss/E-pages/:dist/css/ --source-map && node purge-and-minify.cjs
scripts.process:html: node build.cjs alt && node inline-critical-css.mjs && npm run postbuild:fix-html && npm run postbuild:clean-links && npm run postbuild:titlecase-env

author: I Knit The Web
